attributes.action: Introduce and add more plant life to schools
attributes.additional_details: Plant life being added to schools can have an affect on people with allergies so the types of plants added will still have to be suitable for a place of education. With the correct plants introduced, students can focus a lot more without the worry of stress. I hope for this to reach the right audience and possibly even be considered. I'm sure that there a many people who may agree with this petition. Thank you
attributes.background: Many schools (most of them) do not contain much plant life. Although it isn't extremely education relevant, plants can give off many useful side effects which a hard working student could need. Examples of these effects: people's mental well being, reduction in stress and positive emotions.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about school estates are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to provide additional funding for new plant life in schools, but it would be up to individual schools whether to take this up.
